results.content:

results.content: Aside from the lecture's REALLY STRONG accent, and some few grammar errors, HTML and CSS went ok, but on JS things got a bit confusing.
results.content_html: Aside from the lecture's REALLY STRONG accent, and some few grammar errors, HTML and CSS went ok, but on JS things got a bit confusing.

results.content: The course is just the right level for me, I'm not new to coding, so I really just wanted a quick overview of how syntax works, and the peculiarities of HTML, CSS and JavaScript so I could help myself - the pace is just right and the tips and insights are great!
results.content_html: The course is just the right level for me, I'm not new to coding, so I really just wanted a quick overview of how syntax works, and the peculiarities of HTML, CSS and JavaScript so I could help myself - the pace is just right and the tips and insights are great!

results.content:
By far the best lecturer there is, in one concentrated day I was able to learn and understand all the material. 
Undoubtedly recommend to anyone interested in learning the html,css and JS well to purchase this course.
All recordings were understandable with great and helpful examples. 
I obviously had a successful course experience and it helped me a lot. 
Thank you!

results.content: Great course which gives the fundamentals of web development, which are important if you want to expand your knowledge afterwards for further courses. Great Introduction to web development.
results.content_html: Great course which gives the fundamentals of web development, which are important if you want to expand your knowledge afterwards for further courses. Great Introduction to web development.

results.content: Showed the basics, did not go deep into how something works but overall good for the time frame.

response.content: Thanks, It aims for the basics, this course meant for people who want to get into the web development world for the first time :)

results.content: Interesting so far, though due to my hearing problems, I'm struggling somewhat because of the heavy accent of the lecturer. The automatically generated transcript is not the most accurate.
